unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes: Making Dreams Come True This Festive Season!**
normalised: Home Loan Schemes: Making Dreams Come True This Festive Season!

unnormalised: Thinking of finally buying that flat in Mumbai or that cozy house in Bangalore, huh? Well, now might be the perfect time! Banks and housing finance companies are rolling out some sweet home loan schemes, just in time for the festive season. Think Diwali bonuses and Onam vibes, perfect for planning that next big step.
normalised: Thinking of finally buying that flat in Mumbai or that cozy house in Bangalore, huh? Well, now might be the perfect time! Banks and housing finance companies are rolling out some sweet home loan schemes, just in time for the festive season. Think Diwali bonuses and Onam vibes, perfect for planning that next big step.

unnormalised: HDFC Bank is offering rates starting from 8.4%, while ICICI Bank isn't far behind. Even smaller players like Shriram Housing Finance are in the game.
normalised: H D F C Bank is offering rates starting from eight point four percent, while I C I C I Bank isn't far behind. Even smaller players like Shriram Housing Finance are in the game.

unnormalised: But hold on a second, it's not just about the interest rates. Look out for processing fee waivers – nobody likes extra charges! Some are even throwing in deals on home insurance.
normalised: But hold on a second, it's not just about the interest rates. Look out for processing fee waivers – nobody likes extra charges! Some are even throwing in deals on home insurance.

unnormalised: Thinking of building your dream "Villa" near Lonavala? Check out SBI's land loan scheme, if you have a good credit score (CIBIL 750+) you can easily get loan sanctioned.
normalised: Thinking of building your dream "Villa" near Lonavala? Check out S B I's land loan scheme, if you have a good credit score (C I B I L seven hundred and fifty plus) you can easily get loan sanctioned.

unnormalised: Remember to compare, compare, compare! Don't jump at the first offer like it's the last plate of biryani at a wedding!
normalised: Remember to compare, compare, compare! Don't jump at the first offer like it's the last plate of biryani at a wedding!

unnormalised: And most importantly, understand the terms & conditions before signing on the dotted line. Good luck hunting for that dream home! Get ready for house warming parties, folks!
normalised: And most importantly, understand the terms and conditions before signing on the dotted line. Good luck hunting for that dream home! Get ready for house warming parties, folks!
